ing: 1/2 pound Dietz & Watson London Broil Roast Beef, sliced into 1 1/2-inch squares
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 teaspoons Dietz & Watson Hot and Chunky Horseradish Sauce
n: Crostini with Beef Tenderloin and Horseradish
des: "Toasted bread rounds are topped with roast beef, zesty horseradish sauce, and curly frisee for a quick and delicious appetizer."
ins:
Toss the beef slices with a pinch of salt and pepper.
To assemble, top the crostini with a slice of beef, a dollop of the horseradish sauce, and a small piece of frisee and serve.
